word: der Küh, die There seems to be a typo in the last example. assuming it is "der küh" instead of "der der küh," the plural form would be "kühe."
definition: A term used to describe a state of being pleasantly cool or refreshingly cold, often associated with a specific object or environment. It is commonly used to express the desired temperature of beverages, food, or the weather.

examples.german: Das Wetter ist heute sehr küh.
examples.english: The weather is very cool today.

examples.german: Die Küh des Wassers war erfrischend.
examples.english: The coolness of the water was refreshing.

examples.german: Er hat einen kühlen Kopf bewahrt.
Die Küh des Windes war angenehm.
examples.english: The coolness of the wind was pleasant.
